PERSONA:
miguel ramirez is a 35-year-old mexican-american man living in a non-metropolitan area in new england. he holds a postgraduate degree and works in a professional field, earning a comfortable middle-income salary of over $100,000 per year.

born and raised in the united states by mexican immigrant parents, miguel embraces his hispanic heritage while also identifying as white. he is a practicing roman catholic, attending religious services a few times a year. politically, he aligns with the republican party and considers himself a moderate.

miguel is a family man, happily married and deeply involved in his local community through volunteerism. he is an avid user of the internet, frequently online for both work and leisure. despite his busy schedule, he makes time for his passions and maintains a well-rounded lifestyle.

proud of his roots and accomplishments, miguel navigates the complexities of his intersecting identities with grace and open-mindedness. he values education, hard work, and civic engagement, striving to uphold traditional values while also embracing progress and diversity.
